channel.title: NPC Drop Help
channel.description:
I'm trying to set drops and percentages for my server. I believe the drop system is sanity's. I've tried reading up on it but i can't seem to get it working the way i want it to.
I have these three things. NpcConstant.TSM NPCDROPS.TSM and NPCDROPS.CFG
I've been experimenting with these three files, then restoring them to they're original state afterwards, and all I have learned is that the NpcConstant.TSM does is make a drop drop 100% of the time.
My purpose is to make Tormented Demons, Corporal, Kalphite Queen, etc. to drop rares, but not 100% of the time. Would someone mind helping me with this issue.?

item.title: NPC Drop Help
item.dc:creator: @akz_magic akz magic
item.description:
@akz_magic wrote:

I’m trying to set drops and percentages for my server.
I believe the drop system is sanity’s.
I’ve tried reading up on it but i can’t seem to get it working the way i want it to.

I have these three things.
NpcConstant.TSM
NPCDROPS.TSM
and
NPCDROPS.CFG

I’ve been experimenting with these three files, then restoring them to they’re original state afterwards, and all I have learned is that the NpcConstant.TSM does is make a drop drop 100% of the time.

My purpose is to make Tormented Demons, Corporal, Kalphite Queen, etc. to drop rares, but not 100% of the time. Would someone mind helping me with this issue.?
